alert.note: Alert for Upper Green River Basin; Upper Green River Basin Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 6:40PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Dense Fog expected Tonight... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Areas of fog is expected. Some areas will have dense fog with visibility near a tenth of a mile. * WHERE...Upper Green River Basin including Big Piney, Farson, and Pinedale. * WHEN...Fog is expected to develop between 9 PM and midnight. The fog is then expected to expand in coverage during the predawn hours. The fog will likely linger through late morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures are below freezing which could result in fog depositing some ice on exposed surfaces. Motorists are urged to slow down, use low beam headlights when fog is encountered, and be aware some black ice could be present on area roadways.

area.areaDesc: Upper Green River Basin; Upper Green River Basin Foothills
